name: rew-to-zapco
description: Apply REW generated Auto EQ to Zapco ST-X existing EQ (.xps) file, and generate a new EQ config to be loaded on Zapco ST-X DSP. It saves time and let us input specific frequency generated by REW instead of using the GUI which only allows us to drag the EQ band, which can jumps ~20hz on the higher freqs and hard to do with a laptop trackpad.
author: whitesn
